title: Shareholders Win Class Cert. In Wilmington Trust Fraud Suit
content:
, 11:50 AM ET) -- A Delaware federal judge granted class certification in a securities suit against Wilmington Trust Corp. on Thursday, saying damages did not need to be calculated yet. 
U.S. District Judge Sue Robinson said that the presence of individual situations did not supersede the importance of the classwide harms in the suit, which centers on allegedly false and misleading statements about WTC's loan portfolio, underwriting procedures and overall financial health.
